trans-unit.source: Specifies the file format of the image.
trans-unit.target: Określa format pliku obrazu.

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: Nie dziedziczne.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ImageFormat class indicate image formats such as bitmap (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), enhanced metafile (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>), and icon (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Właściwości klasy ImageFormat wskazują formatów obrazów, takich jak mapy bitowej (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), rozszerzony metaplik (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>), a ikona (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the properties of the ImageFormat class to specify an image format when saving an image using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład umożliwia właściwości klasy ImageFormat określić format obrazu podczas zapisywania obrazu przy użyciu <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>metody.</xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can compare two image formats by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Możesz porównać dwa formaty obrazów za pomocą <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A>metody.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Guid> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> przy użyciu określonego <xref:System.Guid>struktury.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Typically you use the static properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify a particular format such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A>or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, rather than constructing a new <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.
trans-unit.target: Zwykle używane statycznej właściwości <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>klasę, aby określić określony format <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A>lub <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, zamiast tworzenia nowej <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> structure that specifies a particular image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>Strukturę, która określa format określonego obrazu.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitmap (BMP) image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu mapa bitowa (BMP).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the bitmap image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje format obrazu mapy bitowej.

trans-unit.source: Gets the enhanced metafile (EMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu rozszerzony metaplik (EMF).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the enhanced metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje rozszerzony metaplik format obrazu.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified object is an <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that is equivalent to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca wartość wskazującą, czy określony obiekt jest <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> obiekt, który jest odpowiednikiem to <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt do testowania.

trans-unit.source: if o is an object that is equivalent to this object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Jeśli o jest obiekt, który jest odpowiednikiem to obiektu; w przeciwnym razie .

trans-unit.source: Gets the Exchangeable Image File (Exif) format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format pliku obrazu wymienne (Exif).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the Exif format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje Exif format.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca wartość skrótu kodu, który reprezentuje ten obiekt.

trans-unit.source: A hash code that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Wartość skrótu, która reprezentuje ten obiekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu grafiki Interchange Format (GIF).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the GIF image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje format obrazu GIF.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref:System.Guid>strukturę, która reprezentuje to <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> obiektu.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>strukturę, która reprezentuje to <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> obiektu.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu ikony systemu Windows.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje format obrazu ikony systemu Windows.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu wspólnego fotograficzne ekspertów Group (JPEG).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the JPEG image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje obrazów w formacie JPEG.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format mapy bitowej w pamięci.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje format mapy bitowej w pamięci.

trans-unit.source: Gets the W3C Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu W3C Portable Network Graphics (PNG).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the PNG image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje format obrazu PNG.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu w formacie Tagged Image File Format (TIFF).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the TIFF image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje format obrazu TIFF.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Konwertuje to <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> obiektu na ciąg zrozumiałą dla użytkownika.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ciąg, który reprezentuje tę <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows metafile (WMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format obrazu systemu Windows metafile (WMF).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"></xref> object that indicates the Windows metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat"> </xref> Obiekt, który wskazuje formatu Windows metafile obrazu.
